headline: Brad Gerstner Says Microsoft (MSFT) ‘Misunderstood’ On AI Benefit
summary: We recently published Top 10 Buzzing Stocks to Watch as Analysts Predict AI-Led Bull Market Will Continue. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is one of the top buzzing stocks to watch. Brad Gerstner, Altimeter Capital founder and CEO, said in a recent interview on CNBC that Microsoft is “misunderstood” when it comes to the benefits it’s getting […]
